TextView.android:text: The ac power is unplugged\nor there is a power outage!
There is an error in the water level sensors.\nWater level data may not be accurate.
The main pump has run for 10 minutes\nwithout stopping. There could be a float problem. Please check!
The water level seems low,\n but the pump is running! Please check!
The 12v battery may not be charging!\n It's voltage is lower than it should be!
The pumps will not work\nuntil this is fixed!
There was an error in the server!\nThe app may not be receiving data.
